data.text: @EForaadit @CGTNOfficial @NavroopSingh_ It’s not pro Russia propaganda, it’s the truth

@adamleckius @DanNichols_ @CGTNOfficial Maybe you forgot about the Cuban Missile Crisis, the US would do the same thing in the same situation.
You can't point a cannon at someone's door and say it's your freedom

@Semoed_X @DanNichols_ @CGTNOfficial No, it's not. And your point? They are not allowed to want to become members? For some protection from Russia, who occupied/bullied/threatened them for centuries, in different forms?

My country is not a NATO member, for the record. But if 🇺🇦 want membership, I understand
@adamleckius @DanNichols_ @CGTNOfficial It's not the first day that Ukraine wants to join NATO. Keep your unilateral thoughts, it will make you appear very wise😅

@WJIAXI1 @Semoed_X @DanNichols_ @CGTNOfficial Yes? Your point? It was indeed not real diplomacy. Invading another country, murdering civilians, and then offering negotiations on the basis of surrender - that is not real diplomacy, but criminal blackmail. But perhaps China wouldn't agree?
@DanNichols_ @CGTNOfficial Shouldn't you in the West stop the long period of aggression and discrimination?

@Semoed_X @DanNichols_ @CGTNOfficial Ukraine did not agree?? What brand of blindfolds are you using, and where can I buy them?

Leading up to this current crisis, Russia has been playing its neighbor as well as the EU/NATO, setting silly conditions for talks while in parallel planning a full scale invasion(!!). Lol.
@DanNichols_ @CGTNOfficial Just dissolve NATO and this would relax. Oh! And an apology from the USA for being such an asshole imperialist.
